Name: Pineapple Sour
Ingredients: 15 ml Egg white (pasteurised) or 																																			Aquafaba (chickpea water)																								 or 3 dashes Fee Brothers Fee Foam cocktail foamer
Instructions: Select and pre-chill an Old-fashioned glass .
Prepare garnish of pineapple wedge or dehydrated pineapple slice.
Review: Bourbon’s strength and richness of flavour, with tropical pineapple, freshened by citrus.
History: Created in 2017 by Theodoros Spiropoulos, Giffard’s Brand Ambassador in Greece.
Nutrition: One serving of Pineapple Sour contains 242 calories
